NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
CYCAD: Oeno, thank goodness you have voyaged here! One of the native lifeforms has escaped the <color=orange>Sanctuary!</color>
2
1
CYCAD: When I disconnected from my voyager briefly, the quantum shard slipped from my sight... along with one of the native species resting on it!
3 2
CYCAD: When I regained connection to the voyager, the quantum shard was there, but the lifeform on it was gone!
4
3
CYCAD: We must find it before the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color> begins; the <color=orange>Sanctuary</color> is their only protection during the operation of the project!
5
3
OENO: Thank goodness it did not wander far.. But, Cycad: are you not aware the voyager is capable of using the rule of quantum entanglement?
6
5
CYCAD: But Oeno, the surface of the planet is never dark enough for one to use the rule of quantum entanglement (unlike these slumbering species)..
7
6
OENO: Come now, Cycad! Did you not notice what caused the quantum shard to move earlier?
8
7
CYCAD: But of course.. A voyager is unable to observe its surroundings on its own! You have my gratitude for this lesson, Oeno!
SY EX1 3
SY EX3 8
SY EX4 8
